head.title: Search in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} adds powerful text search to {{ProgLang}} applications, supporting various business document formats.

header.title: Find text in business documents
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} lets you search text in documents using flexible and precise queries. Easily integrate search functionality into {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust library for fast text search and document indexing. It supports over 70 file formats, including industry standards like PDF, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Enhance your applications with high-speed, accurate search capabilities.

more_features.title: Enhanced search capabilities
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides advanced text search across more than 70 file formats. Indexing speeds up searches and improves document management efficiency.

feature_1.title: Powerful text search
feature_1.content: Find text in popular document formats such as PDFs, Word files, presentations, and spreadsheets. Supports multiple search methods, including fuzzy search, homophones, and wildcards.

feature_2.title: Optimized indexing for better performance
feature_2.content: Create and reuse search indexes to enhance search speed and efficiency, especially in large document collections.

feature_3.title: Multilingual search support
feature_3.content: Search within documents written in over 80 languages. Detects different keyboard layouts and word variations for improved accuracy.

feature_4.title: Customizable search options
feature_4.content: Narrow down search results with filters, regular expressions, and other advanced search settings.

formats.title: Search in business documents
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 70 file formats, making it easy to search through widely used office documents.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Perform precise and efficient text searches.

examples.comment_1: Directory to store the reusable search index

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows fast and efficient text searches in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, perfect for {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Specify a folder to store the search index.
content.step_2: Select the folder containing your documents.
content.step_3: Configure search options to limit results to {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
content.step_4: Run the search and get results.

code_1.title: Filter documents before searching
code_1.content: Learn how to refine searches using filters
code_1.comment_1: Set up an index that excludes certain file formats
